H0.text: Defence Secretary Liam Fox resigned in October 2011, who was his best-man and adviser whose presence at many official engagements led to the resignation. Adam Winterton

H1.text: Defence Secretary Liam Fox resigned in October 2011, who was his best-man and adviser whose presence at many official engagements led to the resignation. Matthew Gould

H2.text: Defence Secretary Liam Fox resigned in October 2011, who was his best-man and adviser whose presence at many official engagements led to the resignation. David Cameron

H3.text: Defence Secretary Liam Fox resigned in October 2011, who was his best-man and adviser whose presence at many official engagements led to the resignation. Werrity

A4.text: Adam Werritty was not security-cleared with the MoD but made 22 visits to Fox at the MoD in 16 months.

A5.text: The Cabinet Secretary's investigation concluded that Fox's conduct constituted a 'clear breach of the Ministerial code' and posed a 'security risk'.
